channel.title: Piano on 思与制 - A guy's thinking and making

item.title: Some Piano Video Tutorials
item.description: I started learning how to play piano a few months ago. Here’s some great video tutorials I’ve found: Canon in D major (Pachelbel): [YouTube](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDObxlDeeRk Howl’s moving Castle Merry-go-round of life (by Joe Hisaishi): [YouTube](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zt86xb7s-Io Summer (slow, by Joe Hisaishi): YouTube From YouTube channels: PianoKeyz and Jane. Enjoy ;-) Here’s some beautiful piece performed by other people in YouTube: Bach air on the G string piano solo Orchestral suite no.
